languages.text: {n}Мужчина качает головой.{/n} "Вам, призракам, рожденным из небытия, трудно осознать это. Я понимаю. Потому мы стараемся не говорить с призраками".
{n}The man shakes his head.{/n} "You find this hard to fathom, being ghosts born out of nothingness. I can understand. That is why we try to avoid talking to ghosts."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина качает головой.{/n} "Вам, призракам, рожденным из небытия, трудно осознать это. Я понимаю. Потому мы стараемся не говорить с призраками".

languages.text: {n}男が首を横に振る。{/n}「無から生じた亡霊として、この苦難の原因を突き止めるのは難しいと思うのだな。私にはわかる。だから私たちは亡霊どもと進んで話そうとしないのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The man shakes his head.{/n} "You find this hard to fathom, being ghosts born out of nothingness. I can understand. That is why we try to avoid talking to ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}男が首を横に振る。{/n}「無から生じた亡霊として、この苦難の原因を突き止めるのは難しいと思うのだな。私にはわかる。だから私たちは亡霊どもと進んで話そうとしないのだ」
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}男人摇了摇头。{/n}“你觉得很难理解，是因为你是从虚无中诞生的鬼魂，而我能理解。这就是为什么我们很少与鬼魂交谈。”
languages.original_text: {n}The man shakes his head.{/n} "You find this hard to fathom, being ghosts born out of nothingness. I can understand. That is why we try to avoid talking to ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}男人摇了摇头。{/n}“你觉得很难理解，是因为你是从虚无中诞生的鬼魂，而我能理解。这就是为什么我们很少与鬼魂交谈。”
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Il secoue la tête.{/n} « Je peux comprendre que la notion vous échappe, vous qui n'êtes que des spectres issus du néant. C'est pour cela que nous évitons généralement de parler aux fantômes. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man shakes his head.{/n} "You find this hard to fathom, being ghosts born out of nothingness. I can understand. That is why we try to avoid talking to ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il secoue la tête.{/n} « Je peux comprendre que la notion vous échappe, vous qui n'êtes que des spectres issus du néant. C'est pour cela que nous évitons généralement de parler aux fantômes. »
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Sois fantasmas nacidos de la nada, no lo entendéis. Es comprensible, por eso intentamos evitar hablar con seres como vosotros».
languages.original_text: {n}The man shakes his head.{/n} "You find this hard to fathom, being ghosts born out of nothingness. I can understand. That is why we try to avoid talking to ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre niega con la cabeza.{/n} «Sois fantasmas nacidos de la nada, no lo entendéis. Es comprensible, por eso intentamos evitar hablar con seres como vosotros».
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Der Mann schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Für Euch ist das schwer zu begreifen, Ihr seid Geister, die aus dem Nichts geboren wurden. Das verstehe ich. Daher meiden wir es, mit Geistern zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}The man shakes his head.{/n} "You find this hard to fathom, being ghosts born out of nothingness. I can understand. That is why we try to avoid talking to ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Für Euch ist das schwer zu begreifen, Ihr seid Geister, die aus dem Nichts geboren wurden. Das verstehe ich. Daher meiden wir es, mit Geistern zu sprechen."
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Adam başını sallıyor.{/n} "Hiçlikten doğan bir hayalet olduğun için kavramakta zorluk çekiyor olabilirsin. Anlıyorum. Bu yüzden hayaletlerle konuşmaktan kaçınmaya çalışırız."
languages.original_text: {n}The man shakes his head.{/n} "You find this hard to fathom, being ghosts born out of nothingness. I can understand. That is why we try to avoid talking to ghosts."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam başını sallıyor.{/n} "Hiçlikten doğan bir hayalet olduğun için kavramakta zorluk çekiyor olabilirsin. Anlıyorum. Hayaletlerle konuşmaktan bu yüzden kaçınmaya çalışırız."
traits.speaker: Chief
